thread.title: Kat Von D Beauty is having a sitewide sale, and these are the 7 items you should totally snag
thread.title_full: Kat Von D Beauty is having a sitewide sale, and these are the 7 items you should totally snag

author: Amanda Grace
title: Kat Von D Beauty is having a sitewide sale, and these are the 7 items you should totally snag
text:
Kat Von D Beauty is having a sitewide sale, and these are the 7 items you should totally snag This is not a drill! Kat Von D Beauty is having a sitewide sale for friends and family, and we are all invited. We can finally get every shade of Kat Von D’s Everlasting Liquid Lipstick ! The sale only runs until Wednesday, so this kind of flash won’t last for long. This sale includes 20 percent off the entire site, except for limited edition items like the Too Faced Better Together collab and the Studded Trio of lipsticks . From liners to palettes to concealer, Kat Von D has been slaying the makeup game lately. Kat rarely has sales, so it’s a good idea to take advantage of this one!
SURPRISE! GET 20% OFF SITE WIDE NOW with the code FRIENDSANDFAM {at katvondbeauty.com} Link in bio! *limited edition items do not apply #crueltyfreebeauty 
A post shared by Kat Von D Beauty (@katvondbeauty) on Mar 6, 2017 at 11:05am PST 
We already stocked up on some favorites, but here are seven items that you should, too! 1. Everlasting Liquid Lipstick in Lovesick , $20 Kat Von D Beauty This lipstick is the perfect pink!
2. Shade and Light Eye Contour Palette , $48 Kat Von D This is pretty much all the shadow your eyelids need on the daily, and it lasts forever!
3. Ink Eyeliner in Trooper , $20 Kat Von D Kat’s personal favorite, and ours too!
4. Saint Perfume , $65 Kat Von D We added six bottles of this saintly scent to our cart. It smells like heaven and it has been discontinued for so long!
5. Bow N Arrow Set , $20 Kat Von D Beauty We can not get enough of this mini duo! After discount, each product comes out to $8 a piece!
6. Everlasting Liquid Lipstick in Noble , $20 Kat Von D Beauty This lipstick is nuder than nude. We love pairing it with a bold eye!
7. Kat Von D Lock-It Concealer , $25 Kat Von D Beauty A little goes a long way with this concealer that can hide everything from blemishes to tattoos!
We don't know what we'd do without our beloved #Lockit Collection! Who's with us?! #katvondbeauty #crueltyfreebeauty #vegan #lockitrevolution 
A post shared by Kat Von D Beauty (@katvondbeauty) on Feb 9, 2017 at 3:05pm PST 
Use code FREINDSANDFAM at checkout to snag these items and load up your cart now, because the Kat Von D Beauty sitewide sale ends tomorrow!
